title: Suche Coach
body:
Hello

the tilte pretty much says everything im looking for a coach to help me perform better in soloq and then preferable establish a rankteam with me
i have quit league for 4 months and got dropped from diamant 4 to platinum 3 and now i want to get back in league and im looking for someone to help me getting back to my old performance lvl and who i can talk to about stuff i wanna discuss wiht somebody

if u are good in what u are doing i will donate u money with paypal if i see progress in my performance

so if u are interested add me ingame and message me ; OG Señor LMK
